name: Wizard Heist (Luminous Wolf)
description:
In this first-person action-adventure, you're a thief looting a wizard's lair. Pick locks, avoid traps, and steal as much treasure as you can before the wizard returns!

Controls:

  • Mouse and keyboard

Features:

  • Randomized levels
  • Jumping, dexterity, and memory puzzles
  • Four difficulty levels, each with its own high score list
  • Hundreds of weird, wonderful, and zany items to loot
  • Almost anything can be stolen. If it isn't nailed down, you can take it!

There's a free demo in case you want to try it first!
